page.title: 17PEOPLE WHO HELP US AT SCHOOL
page.content: Our school caretaker is Mr. Parish. He looks after our school and helps to make it clean and tidy.He gets up early in the morning,and finishes just before we start school.After we go home he comes back to tidy our classrooms.It takes him about three hours with the help of the cleaners.The cleaners are very helpful because our school is quite large and Mr. Parish would be unable to clean it himself.The cleaners polish the floor with a kind of hoover to make it shiney.They do all the jobs in school like cleaning the toilets,hoovering the carpets and emptying the bins.We also get painters in our school,we have just had the hall painted.
